snippet: In a randomized controlled double-blinded study, iron supplementation reduced fatigue by almost 50 percent in women who are low in iron but not anemic.
abstract: In a randomized controlled double-blinded study, iron supplementation reduced fatigue by almost 50 percent in women who are low in iron but not anemic.

headline.main: Iron Supplements Fight Fatigue in Women
headline.print_headline: Vital Signs | Regimens: Iron Supplements Fight Fatigue in Women
